name: Space is Life!
description:
Team Name

GamedevBulls

Game Goal
Try to have fun while beating your highscore by surving on the arena.

Game desription. 
Space is Life! Its a game where the arena is your health... By reciving damage will gradually collapse proceduraly generated floor beneath you leaving  less and less space to avoid enemies. Try to increase your survival chances by  breaking crystals on top of the obelisks.

Controls: 
WASD to move

Space to jump  

Shift to Dash

LMB and RMB to cast powers
